meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with yellow rootstock used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The hydrastis plant has a bright yellow root that is beneficial in natural remedies.
meanings.sent2: People often use hydrastis root in herbal medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The hydrastis plant decided to open a spa for other plants to enjoy its root treatments.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as the yellow root of a hydrastis plant.
meanings.sent5: The scent of hydrastis root filled the room, calming everyone instantly.
